tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am posting this review on behalf of my father,  Zoeb Zoomkhawalla, currently aged 84.

Here is his experience in his own words.
__________

I had been suffering from osteoarthritis in both the knees for 10 years, or more. I had consulted many doctors. All of them had suggested total knee replacement.

I was reluctant to undergo this procedure because I had come across cases which had failed. I continued with medication and exercise for a long time. However, these failed to give any substantial relief. The pain in my knees continued to worsen, and I reached a stage when the pain was no longer bearable and I could not walk for even two minutes.

I consulted Doctor Amyn Rajani, who also happens to be a family friend. After seeing my reports, he suggested a partial knee replacement for both knees. He assured me that I would be able to walk within two days from the date of the surgery. He also assured me that we could do the replacement for both the knees at one time. His assurance gave me the much needed confidence to undergo the surgery.

I underwent the surgery sometime in December 2019. As he had assured me, I was able to walk on the very second day. On the third day, I had discarded the walker and was walking unaided. Within one month of the surgery, I was able to take a short holiday. During my stay at the resort, I was able to climb the staircases very comfortably three to four times a day.

Over time, the movements have become more flexible and I am completely comfortable going on walks and climbing stairs.

Doctor Rajani has done a fantastic job and helped me to lead a normal life and get back to all my previous activities. I can confidently recommend him to anyone who has a similar problem.

Zoeb Zoomkhawalla.
__________
reply_text: Thank you so Much for your kind words Zoeb Uncle. You have been an amazing patient

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I knew Dr. Rajani as he had earlier done total knee replacement for both knees for my mother in law. I had complete faith in him as a doctor as he had done a fabulous job for my mother in law and the recovery was also really fast and good. When my daughter had a fall I took her to Dr. Rajani, he examined her and concluded that Ria had an ACL tear. He was so confident of his diagonosis even without us having done any MRI for her. He asked us to get the MRI done and the MRI confirmed the same. He made Ria feel very comfortable and explained the surgery in great detail to her and me. He made the entire thing sound very small and answered all my query very patiently. It gave Ria immense faith in him and was extremely calm when she underwent the surgery and the recovery was also very fast. His team of doctors and physio are also extremely compassionate and fabulous. From the second day Ria began walking and in 4 days Ria was walking and doing her chores without help. Thank you Dr. Amyn Rajani and his whole team....More power to you...

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
VISITED FOR ACL RECONSTRUCTION
I tore my acl while playing football twice.
Once when I was 14 years old and the recent one
was in December 2020 and both the surgeries was done by Dr. Rajani. When I tore my acl for the
first time I was a little hesitant whether the operation was the only way to fix my acl. I consulted with 2 doctors in Mumbai and Dr Rajani. After all these inquires I had come to the conclusion of getting a Surgery. During the inquiry process with Dr Rajani, he was able to diagnose the problem without even looking at the MRI. He also suggested that I must do the operation immediately as I had spent one month confirming the injury. While the whole process was smooth I was a little nervous as this was my first operation but he made sure to give me the give me all the comfort and confidence I needed.I can happily confirm that my recovery went according to plan and even when I tore my acl for second time, the first person I went for an inquiry was Dr Rajani as had confidence in his ability .It was a good experience and I will definitely recommend Dr Rajani.

review:
In tribute to Dr. Amyn Rajani,
6 months before I got the shoulder injury by lifting heavy weight and was in immense pain and could not cope up with life..soon I contacted my family Dr. Shirish Bhagwat and he suggested me to take treatment from Dr. Amyn Rajani..In the overall journey of 6 weeks which included surgery medications physiotherapy I am completely fine and now I can live normally which is really impossible to believe and it wouldn‚Äôt have been possible without Dr Amyn & his staff.
Thank you so much for all the care that you have given me over past 6 weeks and further. You made sure that I was always given the best care available. Your compassionate attention and professional care saved my life. I will be always be grateful for the additional years of my life which your care have allowed me to enjoy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Was scouting for a doctor amongst many doctors for the knee issue for my son.  Was referred by a doctor friend who had referred me to Dr. Rajani stating that Dr. Rajani had replaced both the knees of his wife.  My doctor friend had also decided on Dr. Rajani from his own list of doctors.  So when he trusted Dr. Rajani for his good lady, I did not need to go any further for doctor shopping.  

Dr. Rajani was prompt in his assessment.  the reports only confirmed his diagnosis for the record.  He gave the comfort levels before and after surgery.  Subsequent therapy is going on... and I am sure everything will be fine.  His support medical team of Dr. Urvil and Dr. Menakshi are also very professional under the guidance of Dr. Rajani.  I would recommend Dr. Rajani to anybody without any hesitation... All the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had been carrying a shoulder injury since a very long time. It was a labral tear on my right shoulder, that required a surgery known as an arthroscopic Bankart‚Äôs repair. Also there were large cysts in the shoulder capsule, which had to be decompressed. Choosing a surgeon is a very important step for a procedure involving sensitive parts like the shoulder joint. Once I consulted Doctor Amyn Rajani, * **** **** * *** ****** *** **** ****** ** *** ***** *** ** ******** He was quick to diagnose the problem even before seeing the MRI scans and extremely proactive in explaining the procedure. I went under the knife in January 2020, and now within two and a half months, my shoulder is almost back to full ranges and strengthening is the only bit left out. I sincerely thank Dr. Amyn Rajani and his team for their preoperative and postoperative care that made undergoing this surgery very easy for me!

Rajani by a family friend. We found him to be an extremely competent and confident doctor. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We first met Dr. Amyn Rajani in the second half of 2019. My mother had unbearable and constant pain in her right knee, all of a sudden. The first ortho who saw her advised a total knee replacement, we went for a second opinion and got in touch with Dr. Rajani. 

After going through the case he recommended a partial knee replacement. He took the pains of explaining in detail the implication, after care and differences of total and partial knee replacement. 

His pleasing demeanor makes patients and caregivers feel safe and comfortable. Even post-surgery the way he hand holds and kindly sees the patient through on the path of recovery is commendable. And his impeccable sense of dressing is just icing on the cake. 

My mother is back on her morning walks and pretty much does most of the tasks she used to do before the surgery. Highly recommend Dr. Amyn Rajani.

My treatment at OAKS Clinic has been very satisfactory. I had undergone a shoulder repair surgery by Dr. Amyn Rajani. The entire process, from first consultations till discharge went smoothly and I was  well informed about each step of the process. The post-operative physiotherapy was done by Dr. Meenakshi Punamiya with utmost care. Having everything in one place made it not only convenient, but also beneficial since the doctors knew exactly how my treatment was going. The staff members were helpful too.

It was a long process, but knowing I was treated by the very best in the field put my mind at ease. It went like a breeze and I am content with the results I see.

review: Very disappointed after seeing once no response to any query  afterwards no satisfactory answers may be it was not his line of buisness.*** ** **** ** * ***** ******
reply_text:
Mr Mustafa, thank you for your feedback given on 12th of June 2020

Unfortunately the treatment advised to you was for 9 days which would have ended on 17th of June, and you had been advised that incase of any emergency or excessive pain you will need to go to the emergency room of  the hospital and you will be attended to.
 
When the doctor met you for the first time on 8th of June 2020, he spent quality time with you explaining everything in detail, inspite of which you have kept messaging the doctor every day since your first visit from 8th June to 12th June, even without completing the course of treatment. 

Unfortunately,  if the doctor keeps replying to all messages, he will be on the phone the whole day, which is practically impossible. 

The doctor only replies to important messages and to the one which require any immediate response.

Appologies for your inconvenience.
